hero.title: Turning ideas into
hero.desc: Specialist in Artificial Intelligence, Web Development and Process Automation. Creating innovative solutions that drive business and optimize results.
hero.full: Turning business challenges into <1>smart solutions</1> with AI and Automation.

about.title: About Me
about.desc: I am passionate about technology and solving real-world problems. After years working as a systems analyst, I decided to dive into the world of Artificial Intelligence to turn business challenges into innovation opportunities. My mission is to create solutions that positively impact people and companies, combining AI, automation, and web development.
about.trajetoria: My journey began in support and systems analysis, where I learned the importance of listening to the client and deeply understanding processes. The desire to go further, to create and innovate, led me to a postgraduate degree in AI. Today, I seek to combine my practical experience with the power of data and automation to deliver concrete results.
about.motivacao: I believe technology only makes sense when it improves people's lives. My goal is to be a reference in smart solutions, contributing to a more efficient, human, and innovative market.

services.desc: I offer complete solutions in the most in-demand areas of today's technology market.

portfolio_cards.title: E-commerce Recommendation System
portfolio_cards.desc: Developed a personalized recommendation system that increased related product sales by 25%. Responsible for the entire AI architecture, backend integration, and cloud deployment.

portfolio_cards.title: Financial Process Automation
portfolio_cards.desc: Implemented RPA for bank reconciliation automation, reducing processing time by 60%. Project included process analysis, bot development, and team training.

portfolio_cards.title: Healthcare Data Analysis Dashboard
portfolio_cards.desc: Created an interactive dashboard for hospital indicators analysis, enabling faster, data-driven decisions. Resulted in a 40% increase in report efficiency.
